attributes.action: Exempt spouses of UK citizens from extortioanate 100% plus price increases for settlement visas, leave to remain and naturalization
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
From April 07 The price for settlement visas is set to increase from £260 to £500, Indefinite leave to remain is set to rise from £335 to £750 naturalization from £200 to £575 to name a few of the increases. 

 These visas and price increases affect the foriegn spouses of  taxpaying UK citizens. 

Two are compulsary (if the couple wish to remain in the UK) and one, despite the name, has to be reapplied for every time the foriegn spouse gets a new passport (if they do not take British citizenship). 

Please will the Prime Minister raise this issue with the Immigration Minister and ask for spouses of UK citizens to be exempted from these increases or for a new category of fees to  be introduced.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
